# systems.builtin.deterministic.continuous.AutonomousLinearSystem { #cdesym.systems.builtin.deterministic.continuous.AutonomousLinearSystem }

```python
systems.builtin.deterministic.continuous.AutonomousLinearSystem(*args, **kwargs)
```

Autonomous first-order linear system: dx/dt = -a*x

No control input (nu=0).

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description                    | Default   |
|--------|--------|--------------------------------|-----------|
| a      | float  | Decay rate (positive = stable) | `1.0`     |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> system = AutonomousLinearSystem(a=1.0)
>>> system.nu
0
>>> dx = system(np.array([1.0]), u=None)  # -1*1 = -1
```
